operations.description: The Twilio call to send the user a reply

tql.tql:
SELECT * FROM twilio.send_message
  WHERE mediaTypeExtension='.json'
  AND AccountSid='ACa6adde116ecf6c10cf4a7a1afb8a41c9'
  AND $body=(SELECT {
    'To' : @recipient,
    'From' : '+14153013658',
    'Body' : @message
  })

Runs an apify task to rescrape the website every week
Pulls the most recent scrape from apify and matches the most recent one with that location

tql.tql:
SELECT title, date, url FROM apify_v2.get_items_in_task_last_run_dataset
  WHERE actorTaskId='GdsRKHEyB5suwN7kG'
  AND status='SUCCEEDED'
  AND location=@location
  LIMIT 1
